name: Solarized-limechat-theme
tagline: Limechat for OS X Solarized theme
body:
### What this is.
This is a theme for an Open Source IRC client for Mac OS X, Limechat. This theme is based on the solarized swatch by [Ethan Schoonover](http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized) and some off-swatch colors. I actually got inspired to create this theme because of the prolonged use of the solarized theme in [Sublime Text 3](http://www.sublimetext.com/) ;)

### How To Use
- Install Limechat
    Like of course huh? You can download it [here](http://limechat.net/mac/) if you haven't though.
- Place the theme in the approriate folder
    Download the theme from links above (either the zip or tar file) and copy the extracted files. Open the `Applications` folder and find Limechat there, right-click on it, and choose `Show Packages Content`. Go to `Contents` > `Themes` and paste the copied files there.
- Enable the theme
    If your Limechat app is already running, restart the app and click `Limechat`> `Preferences` > `Theme` and change the `Current Theme` to Solarized. That's it! 

### Create your own theme
I'll post on how to create your own theme in my blog post later. Stay tuned at http://tadityar.ghost.io or http://blog.tadityar.web.id

### Authors and Contributors
Tasya Aditya Rukmana (@tadityar) the theme maker, Satoshi Nakagawa (@psychs) the Limechat maker, and [Ethan Schoonover](http://ethanschoonover.com) for the Solarized swatch.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the theme? Just contact me at tadityar@gmail.com
